#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
set<int> s;
inline int inp()
{
    int noRead=0;
    char p= getchar_unlocked();
    for(;p<33;)
    {
     p=getchar_unlocked();
    };
    while(p>32)
    {
     noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
     p=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return noRead;
};
int main()
{
	int t,i,n,l;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		//scanf("%d",&n);
		n=inp();
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			//scanf("%d",&l);
			l=inp();
			s.insert(l);
		}
		printf("%d\n",s.size()-1);
		s.clear();
	}
}
